statements: SELECT * FROM SalesData
SELECT product_name, total_revenue FROM SalesData ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM SalesData WHERE unit_price > 50
SELECT product_name, quantity_sold, total_revenue FROM SalesData ORDER BY quantity_sold ASC, total_revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE quantity_sold < 100
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM SalesData WHERE quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 50.00 AND total_revenue > 1000 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM SalesData WHERE total_revenue < 5000;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price, quantity_sold, total_revenue FROM SalesData WHERE unit_price > 50.00 ORDER BY quantity_sold DESC, total_revenue ASC;
SELECT product_name, total_revenue AS revenue FROM SalesData WHERE quantity_sold < 50 GROUP BY product_name HAVING SUM(unit_price * quantity_sold) > 5000;
SELECT * FROM best_selling_products;
SELECT product_name, sales_count FROM best_selling_products ORDER BY sales_count DESC;
SELECT product_name FROM best_selling_products WHERE sales_count > 100;
SELECT * FROM future_collections WHERE collection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT collection_name, collection_date FROM future_collections ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM best_selling_products ORDER BY product_name DESC, sales_count ASC;
SELECT product_name, sales_count FROM best_selling_products WHERE sales_count > 100 ORDER BY sales_count DESC;
SELECT collection_name, collection_date FROM future_collections WHERE collection_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY collection_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, sales_count FROM best_selling_products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM best_selling_products UNION SELECT * FROM future_collections;
SELECT * FROM Products
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50
SELECT product_name, category FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT collection_name, start_date, end_date FROM Collections ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_quantity FROM Sales WHERE sale_quantity > 10
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM Sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT collection_name, start_date, end_date FROM Collections WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date, sale_quantity FROM Sales WHERE sale_quantity > 10 ORDER BY sale_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, sales_quantity FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, sales_quantity, sales_date FROM sales_data WHERE sales_quantity > 100;
SELECT sales_date, product_name FROM sales_data WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT category_name FROM product_categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, sales_quantity, sales_date FROM sales_data WHERE sales_quantity > 100;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM product_categories GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT product_name, sales_quantity, collection_name, launch_date FROM sales_data JOIN future_collections ON sales_data.product_id = future_collections.collection_id;
SELECT product_id, sales_rank FROM best_selling_products WHERE sales_rank <= 10 ORDER BY sales_rank ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sales;
SELECT product_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM Sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM Sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY category, price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM Orders JOIN Customers ON Orders.customer_id = Customers.customer_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT collection_name, start_date, end_date FROM Collections WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date ASC, collection_name DESC LIMIT 3;
